content: *gaillean is an open cardigan featuring a celtic inspired cable collar band and seed stitch all over named after an old irish word for storm gailleann is made to keep you warm through the wildest squall the seed stitch body and inset pockets add a durability to this sweater that helps it double as a coat in more moderate climates magpie fiber s sturdy domestic worsted yarn shows beautiful definition in both the cables and the seed stitch gailleann is knit from the top-down with raglan shaping knitting the cable collar band simultaneously * **sizes ** 1 2 3 4 5 bust measurement 34 39 42 47 50 - 86 99 107 119 127 cm **yarn ** magpie fibers domestic worsted 100% merino 200 yards / 115 grams 6 7 8 9 10 skeins tactical **materials ** us 7 - 4 5mm circular needle 32 or longer us 7 - 4 5mm circular needle 16 or longer for magic loop us 7 4 5mm dpns optional for sleeves stitch markers tapestry needle for weaving in ends waste yarn of similar weight for provisional cast on stitch holder **gauge ** 15sts x 28 row = 4 -10cm using us 7 - 4 5mm over seed stitch blocked 26sts x 24 row = 4 -10cm using us 7-4 5mm over cable chart pattern blocked **special techniques** provisional cast on knitting in the round knitting from a cable chart i-cord bind off *eratta the cable chart legend should read as follows 2/2 rpc - slip 2 to cn hold to back k2 p2 from cn 2/2 lpc - slip 2 to cn hold to front p2 k2 from cn * 1 https //www magpiefibers com/ 2 https //www vogueknittinglive com/newyork18
